statements: DELETE FROM TortureReports WHERE report_id = 10 AND location = 'Secret Facility';
DELETE FROM TortureReports WHERE victim_name = 'John Doe' AND report_date between '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM TortureAnalytics WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM TortureReports WHERE location = 'Secret Facility' AND report_date > '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM Incident WHERE id = 100 AND location = 'Street A';
DELETE FROM Perpetrator WHERE age > 30 OR gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM Perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM VictimDetails WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM PerpetratorDetails WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
